commenter_a: As an alternative to the Polin museum (which is excellent) I would recommend the Warsaw Uprising Museum, which also opened in the last few years. It is a very well designed and engaging museum that brings to life this difficult piece of World War II history.
post_message: Warsaw is finally growing into its aspirations as Eastern Europe’s culture capital. Here's what to do if you're ever there.
